question_stem.en: A 25-year-old woman comes to the office due to a 4-week history of a pruritic skin rash. The patient has no chronic medical conditions and takes no medication. Vital signs are normal. On examination, there are pink papules distributed symmetrically over the anterior surfaces of the shins and ankles. {{exhibit_1}} Shave biopsy reveals prominent hyperkeratosis with a thickened granular layer. {{exhibit_2}} In addition, there is a bandlike infiltrate of mononuclear cells (predominantly lymphocytes) in the subjacent superficial dermis that involves the overlying epidermis. {{exhibit_3}} The rete ridges have a sharpened, sawtooth appearance. {{exhibit_4}} The basal layer of the epidermis is degenerated, with scattered colloid bodies. {{exhibit_5}} Which of the following is the most likely diagnosis? {{exhibit_6}}
question_stem.zh: 一名25岁的女性因4周瘙痒性皮疹就诊。患者无慢性病史，未服用药物。生命体征正常。体格检查显示，在胫骨前表面和踝部对称分布粉红色丘疹。{{exhibit_1}} 剃须活检显示显着角化过度伴颗粒层增厚。{{exhibit_2}} 此外，在涉及覆盖表皮的下层浅表真皮中存在带状单核细胞（主要为淋巴细胞）浸润。{{exhibit_3}} 皮脊呈尖锐的锯齿状外观。{{exhibit_4}} 表皮基底层变性，散在有胶样小体。{{exhibit_5}} 以下哪项是最可能的诊断？{{exhibit_6}}

question.en: Which of the following is the most likely diagnosis?
question.zh: 以下哪项是最可能的诊断？

explanation.en: This patient has a pruritic rash consistent with lichen planus (LP), an immunologically mediated skin disorder primarily affecting middle-aged adults. {{exhibit_7}} The skin lesions typically occur symmetrically on the flexural surfaces of the wrists and ankles but can also involve the nails, oral mucous membranes, and genitalia. The characteristic skin lesions are described by the 5 Ps: pruritic, purple/pink, polygonal papules and plaques and can form lines of minor trauma (Koebner phenomenon). Chronic lesions often show white, lacy markings known as Wickham striae. Although the etiology of LP is unknown, it is characterized by a (CD8+) T cell-mediated response to the cells along the junction of the dermis and epidermis, resulting in the following characteristic histologic findings: Hyperkeratosis (thickening of stratum corneum), Bandlike lymphocytic infiltrate at the dermoepidermal junction (interface dermatitis), Scattered eosinophilic, colloid (Civatte) bodies (apoptotic keratinocytes), Hypergranulosis (thickening of stratum granulosum), Sawtooth rete ridges. {{exhibit_8}}
explanation.zh: 该患者出现瘙痒性皮疹，与扁平苔藓 (LP) 一致，扁平苔藓是一种主要影响中年人的免疫介导性皮肤病。{{exhibit_7}} 皮损通常对称性地发生在腕部和踝部的屈侧面，但也可能累及指甲、口腔黏膜和生殖器。特征性皮损由 5 个 P 描述：瘙痒性、紫/粉红色、多边形丘疹和斑块，并且可以形成轻微外伤的线条（Koebner 现象）。慢性病变通常显示白色、蕾丝状标记，称为 Wickham 纹。虽然 LP 的病因尚不清楚，但它的特征是 (CD8+) T 细胞介导的对真皮和表皮交界处细胞的反应，导致以下特征性组织学发现：角化过度（角质层增厚）、真皮-表皮交界处的带状淋巴细胞浸润（界面性皮炎）、散在嗜酸性、胶样（Civatte）小体（凋亡角质形成细胞）、颗粒层增生（颗粒层增厚）、锯齿状皮脊。{{exhibit_8}}

summary.en: The patient presents with a 4-week history of a pruritic, symmetrical rash on the shins and ankles. Histopathology reveals hyperkeratosis, a bandlike lymphocytic infiltrate, sawtooth rete ridges, and colloid bodies. These findings are characteristic of lichen planus.
summary.zh: 患者表现为胫骨和踝部 4 周瘙痒性对称性皮疹病史。组织病理学显示角化过度、带状淋巴细胞浸润、锯齿状皮脊和胶样小体。这些发现是扁平苔藓的特征。
